body.name: TASVAC Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 6-in-1 Cordless Vacuum, 28KPa Powerful Battery Stick Vacuum Rechargeable Vacuum 2200m-A-h Up to 45 Mins, Lightweight Vacuum Cleaner for Home Carpet and Floor Pet Hair
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 12 mins
features: 【28KPa Powerful Suction with Brushless Motor】This Upgraded TASVAC cordless vacuum cleaner features high-efficient brushless motor that provides more powerful suction and and excellent cleaning performance. Cordless vacuum with brushless motors have become popular due to their efficiency, durability, and power. Brushless Vacuum cleaner allow for more powerful suction and quieter operation, making cleaning easier and more convenient for users worldwide.

【Adjustable Suction Modes】The vacuum cleaner has adjustable suction power modes. Standard mode is good for dust, pet hair, sesame, etc. and with the max mode it can quickly pick up grain, cat litter, etc from the floor, carpet, sofa, desk, curtain, car, and so on. Whether it's cleaning up after meal times or keeping your living space tidy throughout the day, this vacuum cleaner provides a convenient and efficient solution to all of your cleaning needs.

【45 mins Runtime & Fast Charging】This wireless vacuum offers convenience and portability, making cleaning a breeze without the hassle of cords and plugs. And it can run for up to 45 mins on a single charge, allowing you to clean without interruption. Besides, the battery vacuums fully charge just in 3-4 hours before running again. So whether you're looking to upgrade cleaning routine or seeking a more convenient way to keep your home tidy, this rechargeable vacuum is exactly what you need.

【Advanced Filtration System】Equipped with 4 high-efficient stages of a complete sealing filtration system, the vacuum cleaner carpet and floor can trap 99.99% of microscopic particles and expel cleaner air. The househeld vacuum cleaner filters the air while cleaning to take full care of your home's cleanliness. (Please Note: The stainless filter is washable and the HEPA filter is not washable. And regular cleaning of the stainless filter will prevent weakening of suction and clogging.)

【6-in-1 Versatile Cleaning & Lightweight】Weighing in at just 3.5lbs, this cordless stick vacuum offers the ultimate in versatility and portability, perfect for one-hand cleaning. It's an excellent choice for older adults. In addition to its lightweight design, this vac features a telescoping wand that can convert to a handheld vacuum, perfect for furniture, curtains, and car. The flexible brush head and built-in LED light enable to capture even the tiniest bits of dust and dirt in every corner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Light Weight Vac
reviews.reviewText: Love Love Love this little vaccum cleaner! Light weight, dual suction power modes, attachments interchange, great battery power and super easy to clean.Returned another brand after several days and use. Ordered this one and super happy with my decision. Have used several times and battery power still going strong. Super lite weeight and very quiet.Think I am going to order a second one for my Mom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cat hair be gone
reviews.reviewText: This is my review for TASVAC Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 28KPa Powerful Cordless Vacuum 6-in-1, Battery Stick Vacuum Rechargeable Vacuum 2200m-A-h Up to 45 Mins. If you're shopping for your first battery operated vacuum and wanted it to compare to your corded quality vacuum don't. Battery operated units just don't have the power to compare. What they do have is convenience, lightweight and ease of use. This unit is on the inexpensive side of battery operated vacuums. It has most all of the features of this type of product. Adjustable handle height, decent suction, HEPA filter and non-scratching roller brush for use on hardwood floors are features that are included. Cheaper battery operated vacuums have smaller batteries. The runtime on mine on high is 15 minutes continuous. Low speed is about 20 minutes. So if you have a $50,000 ft² home this probably won't last to do the whole home. Smaller spaces it's perfect. Battery operated units do not have big dirt containers. You will be emptying once or twice per vacuum. The only real negative with this unit that I see is that the hepa filter is not washable. You can clean it a number of times but would last much longer and work better if you were able to wash it. Two are included with the vacuum and additional filters are available here on Amazon. I found this information out by emailing the vendor and their excellent customer service department promptly communicating the information to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this thing.
reviews.reviewText: I’m having so much fun using this powerful yet extremely lightweight cordless vacuum. I had it charged overnight and was able to go through post-holiday mess (about 15,000sqft in 20 minutes) without it powering off yet. This is ideal for an effective quick sweep, especially if you have shedding pets. Also, great for older folks because it’s so easy to lift and maneuver.Don’t let the light weight and convenience fool you though -this thing has some serious power. It easily sucks up most anything from piles of hair to large leaves.For the price point range, this is a top-notch cordless vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Poweful little vacuum
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to use and very light weight. Love that this is cordless. One hand usage! Charges quite quickly and holds a charge for about 30 mins. Maybe more if you only use the low setting. I switch between the low and high settings. I mainly use on hardwood or tile but it has also worked on my rugs.Easy to clean but I wish there was a 2nd opening on the top of the filter.Con- the long wand does not stay upright when stored. To bad it does not have a locking feature where the wand and the head of vacuum are connected. It would help it from falling side to side or sliding forward, when stored.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Powerful and Convenient
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is an excellent value for the price. The cordless design is useful. I had the time to vacuum two time and about half of the dining room before the initial charge has run out. It comes with a wall mounting kit if you would like to hang it, but I prefer to keep it in the broom closet. It does not take up much space, especially when disassembled.It is very convenient to charge, as you can disassemble it and charge the motor alone. It takes two or three passes to pick up pet hair or heavy debris in the carpet. The pieces fit together with a snap, and I have had no problems with their connection, so far. You can change the floor module for a stick or duster module, so you can easily transition from carpet to corners to stairs to cobwebs. It is sturdy. The light is bright and convenient when getting under those hard to reach areas. The reservoir fills quickly, especially when vacuuming heavy debris. That shows that it is powerful. The head is a little bit narrow on the floor attachment, as you can see in the video. It is still a great value, as it succeeded in clearing those three rooms’ carpet areas. I highly recommend this vacuum. First, it is very powerful compared to other sweeper vacs, and second, it is an excellent value compared to other full sized handhelds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most Useful Vacuum Cleaner!
reviews.reviewText: This is the one piece of cleaning equipment that I like the most this year. Very easy to assemble, and it comes with a rechargeable battery! We have the option to either use it short or long; and there are several suction head attachments provided as well. It's light weight, super convenient to maneuver around the floor (or carpet), an easy process to empty the dust bin, and charging is swift! I've been using this for the past couple days and I can recommend this very highly!
